title: Minimum Stay Restrictions
description: Manage minimum stay restrictions easily with RoomPriceGenie. Set the right MinLOS rules to control how many nights a guest should book to optimize occupancy.
content: ## Minimum Stay Restrictions:smarter booking control Easily manage minimum stay restrictions inside RoomPriceGenie. With this feature just a click away, you have more control over your inventory to grow your revenue.Thanks to smartMinLOSsettings, you can fine-tune your availability and attract the right bookings at the right time. ## Takecontrolof who books, when, and for how long You control the minimum number of nights a guest must book for a particular date. You can set a two-night minimum stay in RoomPriceGenie to boost your revenue and create a better guest experience. Our flexibleMinLOSoptions help you stay competitive without compromising your business goals. ## Maximizeprofitability By encouraging longer stays through smartMinLOSsettings. ## Increaseyour occupancy Fill quieter nights around busy periods with a strategicMinLOSapproach. ## Saveon housekeeping costs Reduce the need for frequent room turnovers by promoting longer stays. ## Enjoyableguest experience Boost guest satisfaction by offering more value, leading to better reviews and repeat visits. ## Howminimum stay restrictionsaffect revenue Minimum stay restrictions, orMinLOS, can have a big impact on your overall revenue strategy. When used wisely, they allow you to optimize your bookings during both high-demand and quieter periods. By requiring guests to book a longer stay during peak seasons, holiday weekends, or special events, you can maximize your occupancy and increase the average revenue per booking. Without a thoughtfulMinLOSplan, you risk short gaps between reservations—those awkward, hard-to-fill nights that can chip away at your earnings. A smartMinLOSapproach helps smooth out your calendar, keeping rooms full and avoiding those low-revenue gaps. Plus, longer stays tend to mean happier guests, lower housekeeping costs, and more efficient staff scheduling. With RoomPriceGenie, setting and adjusting minimum stay restrictions is quick and simple. You can respond instantly to market changes, making it easier to focus on what matters most: giving your guests a great experience and growing your business at the same time. ## MinLOS and their role inhotel booking strategy MinLOSisn’t just about setting limits; it’s about building a stronger, more profitable booking strategy. Every stay pattern tells a story, and with the rightMinLOSsettings in place, you can guide that story to better outcomes for your property. With RoomPriceGenie, you can set flexible minimum stays that adapt automatically based on occupancy, seasonality, booking pace, and market trends. Imagine applying a three-night minimum around major holidays to maximize profits, then switching to more relaxed restrictions midweek to capture additional bookings. You can even create rules thatautomatically set, adjust, or removeMinLOS restrictions based on occupancy levels, lead time, and more. That means less manual oversight and more confidence your strategy is working. Even if you’re off the clock. By weavingMinLOSinto your revenue management strategy, you stay agile and competitive. RoomPriceGenie makes it easy to set smart restrictions without adding complexity, helping you get the most out of every opportunity. ## Make morerevenue Now, managing minimum stay restrictions is as easy as managing your pricing. By controlling the length of stays with smartMinLOSstrategies, you can better manage your property’s inventory, filling rooms on quieter nights and capitalizing on high-demand periods. With RoomPriceGenie’s Minimum Stay Restrictions, you can now: ## Read & AdjustMinimum Stays Automatically view your existing minimum stay settings directly within RoomPriceGenie. Easily make daily adjustments or apply bulk edits to yourMinLOSrestrictions. ## Automatically CorrectImpossible Scenarios With orphan gap correction, RoomPriceGenie will search for and correct impossible minimum stay scenarios, such as when surrounding nights are fully booked for a specific room type. ## Automate & DefineRules Set conditions to automatically set MinLOS restrictions based on occupancy and lead time. Set criteria to automatically remove MinLOS restrictions within a certain number of days before the arrival date or in response to not meeting an occupancy threshold. ## Let RoomPriceGenie work on your room rates for just 14 days You can go live with your new prices in a few days and start getting the benefit without paying a penny. Book a call with our revenue manager to see why 3,500+ travel accommodation owners and managers love RoomPriceGenie. Trusted by 4,000+ independent hoteliers Please note: The Minimum Stay Restrictions feature is available for the following Property Management Systems:Mews, Cloudbeds, RMS Cloud, Apaleo, Beds24,Booking Factory, GuestPoint, Ibelsa, Zonal (HLS)andResly. More systems will be added soon. ##
